verses.verse: Then answered <S%H6030><s%> Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> the Temanite <S%H8489><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>,
Can a man <S%H1397><s%> be profitable <S%H5532><s%> unto God <S%H410><s%>? Surely <S%H3588><s%> he that is wise <S%H7919><s%> is profitable unto himself <S%H5532><s%>.

Is it any pleasure <S%H2656><s%> to the Almighty <S%H7706><s%>, that thou art righteous <S%H6663><s%>? Or is it gain <S%H1215><s%> to him <S%H1870><s%>, that thou makest thy ways perfect <S%H8552><s%>?
Is it for thy fear <S%H3374><s%> of him that he reproveth <S%H3198><s%> thee <S%H935><s%>, That he entereth with thee into judgment <S%H4941><s%>?
Is not thy wickedness <S%H7451><s%> great <S%H7227><s%>? Neither is there any end <S%H7093><s%> to thine iniquities <S%H5771><s%>.
For thou hast taken pledges <S%H2254><s%> of thy brother <S%H251><s%> for nought <S%H2600><s%>, And stripped <S%H6584><s%> the naked <S%H6174><s%> of their clothing <S%H899><s%>.
Thou hast not given water <S%H4325><s%> to the weary <S%H5889><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%>, And thou hast withholden <S%H4513><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> from the hungry <S%H7457><s%>.
But as for the mighty <S%H2220><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, he had the earth <S%H776><s%>; And the honorable man <S%H5375><s%>, he dwelt in it <S%H3427><s%>.
Thou hast sent <S%H7971><s%> widows <S%H490><s%> away empty <S%H7387><s%>, And the arms <S%H2220><s%> of the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> have been broken <S%H1792><s%>.
Therefore snares <S%H6341><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> thee <S%H6597><s%>, And sudden fear <S%H6343><s%> troubleth thee <S%H926><s%>,
Or darkness <S%H2822><s%>, so that thou canst not see <S%H7200><s%>, And abundance <S%H8229><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> cover thee <S%H3680><s%>.
Is not God <S%H433><s%> in the height <S%H1363><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>? And behold <S%H7200><s%> the height <S%H7218><s%> of the stars <S%H3556><s%>, how high they are <S%H7311><s%>!
And thou sayest <S%H559><s%>, What doth God <S%H410><s%> know <S%H3045><s%>? Can he judge <S%H8199><s%> through the thick darkness <S%H6205><s%>?
Thick clouds <S%H5645><s%> are a covering <S%H5643><s%> to him <S%H7200><s%>, so that he seeth not <S%H1980><s%>; And he walketh on the vault <S%H2329><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
Wilt thou keep <S%H8104><s%> the old <S%H5769><s%> way <S%H734><s%> Which wicked <S%H205><s%> men <S%H4962><s%> have trodden <S%H1869><s%>?
Who were snatched away <S%H7059><s%> before their time <S%H6256><s%>, Whose foundation <S%H3247><s%> was poured <S%H3332><s%> out as a stream <S%H5104><s%>,
Who said <S%H559><s%> unto God <S%H410><s%>, Depart <S%H5493><s%> from us <S%H7706><s%>; And, What can the Almighty do for us <S%H6466><s%>?
Yet he filled <S%H4390><s%> their houses <S%H1004><s%> with good <S%H2896><s%> things <S%H6098><s%>: But the counsel of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is far from me <S%H7368><s%>.
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H8055><s%>, and are glad; And the innocent <S%H5355><s%> laugh them to scorn <S%H3932><s%>,
Saying <S%H518><s%>, Surely they that did rise up against <S%H7009><s%> us are cut off <S%H3582><s%>, And the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of them the fire <S%H784><s%> hath consumed <S%H398><s%>.
Acquaint <S%H5532><s%> now thyself with him <S%H7999><s%>, and be at peace: Thereby good <S%H2896><s%> shall come unto thee <S%H935><s%>.
Receive <S%H3947><s%>, I pray thee <S%H8451><s%>, the law from his mouth <S%H6310><s%>, And lay up <S%H7760><s%> his words <S%H561><s%> in thy heart <S%H3824><s%>.

If thou return <S%H7725><s%> to the Almighty <S%H7706><s%>, thou shalt be built up <S%H1129><s%>, If thou put away <S%H7368><s%> unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from thy tents <S%H168><s%>.
And lay <S%H7896><s%> thou thy treasure <S%H1220><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%>, And the gold of Ophir <S%H211><s%> among the stones <S%H6697><s%> of the brooks <S%H5158><s%>;
And the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> will be thy treasure <S%H1220><s%>, And precious <S%H8443><s%> silver unto thee <S%H3701><s%>.
For then shalt thou delight <S%H6026><s%> thyself in the Almighty <S%H7706><s%>, And shalt lift up <S%H5375><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> unto God <S%H433><s%>.
Thou shalt make thy prayer <S%H6279><s%> unto him <S%H8085><s%>, and he will hear thee <S%H7999><s%>; And thou shalt pay thy vows <S%H5088><s%>.
Thou shalt also decree <S%H1504><s%> a thing <S%H562><s%>, and it shall be established <S%H6965><s%> unto thee <S%H216><s%>; And light shall shine <S%H5050><s%> upon thy ways <S%H1870><s%>.
When they cast thee down <S%H8213><s%>, thou shalt say <S%H559><s%>, There is lifting up <S%H1466><s%>; And the humble <S%H7807><s%> person <S%H5869><s%> he will save <S%H3467><s%>.
He will deliver <S%H4422><s%> even him <S%H336><s%> that is not innocent <S%H5355><s%>: Yea <S%H4422><s%>, he shall be delivered through the cleanness <S%H1252><s%> of thy hands <S%H3709><s%>.
